channel.title: Dry Transfer on 迷失的星云
channel.description: Recent content in Dry Transfer on 迷失的星云

item.title: procedure of dry transfer
item.description: Step1: Clean the beaker in ultrasound with acetone then IPA then DI water. Note: make sure no residual of acetone in the beaker because acetone may react with chloroform and produce explosive compounds. Step2: Dissolve polycarbonate in chloroform, mass ratio 6% (6%~10%), using ultrasound to accelerate the dissolution. Note: must wear a mask when using chloroform because chloroform can generate $\mathrm{COCl_2}$ (10 times toxicity of $\mathrm{Cl_2}$) under light Step3: Clean
